name: PHImageRequestOptions
desc: A set of options affecting the delivery of still image representations of Photos assets you request from an image manager.

items.name: var isSynchronous: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether Photos processes the image request synchronously.

items.name: var version: PHImageRequestOptionsVersion
items.desc: The version of the image to be requested.

items.name: enum PHImageRequestOptionsVersion
items.desc: Options for requesting an image asset with or without adjustments, used by the version property.

items.name: var deliveryMode: PHImageRequestOptionsDeliveryMode
items.desc: The requested image quality and delivery priority.

items.name: enum PHImageRequestOptionsDeliveryMode
items.desc: Options for delivering requested image data, used by the deliveryMode property.

items.name: var resizeMode: PHImageRequestOptionsResizeMode
items.desc: A mode that specifies how to resize the requested image.

items.name: enum PHImageRequestOptionsResizeMode
items.desc: Options for how to resize the requested image to fit a target size, used by the resizeMode property.

items.name: var normalizedCropRect: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangle for requesting a cropped version of the original image.

items.name: var isNetworkAccessAllowed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether Photos can download the requested image from iCloud.

items.name: var progressHandler: PHAssetImageProgressHandler?
items.desc: A block that Photos calls periodically while downloading the image.

items.name: typealias PHAssetImageProgressHandler
items.desc: The signature for a block that Photos calls while downloading asset data from iCloud. Used by the progressHandler property.
